name: Ancient Armour: Crystals
description:
This game is a platformer made in Unity for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1. The game is based on mario games with a massive twist. In Ancient Armour, you are able to find pieces of equipment that will reduce the amount of damage you can take. Although, obtaining armor pieces might not be as easy as you can think!

Once having both pieces of the armour, you are capable of combining them with crystals and having much stronger effect than without. Therefore, aim to combine them together to make them stronger!

The game has no time limit, but can be very challenging as if player dies, the game resets to level 1.

The amount of damage taken can be reduced if wearing the armour. 

Collect coins and I hope you will enjoy the game!
